Title: The Bremen Town Musicians
Writer: Jacob Grimm (tale), Wilhelm Grimm (tale), Vasiliy Livanov (screenplay), Yuriy Entin (screenplay)
Actors: Elmira Zherzdeva, Oleg Anofriev, Anatoliy Gorokhov
Plot: A loosely based story on the Brothers Grimm fairy tale, Town Musicians of Bremen about a donkey, a dog, a cat, and a rooster and their master Troubadour.
